scenes.title: My Childhood Friend Who Wants to Become a Voice Actor Received a Job in an Erotic Anime... We Practiced Dubbing Sex Scenes Using My Penis... Sakura Kurumi
scenes.synopsis: Sakura Kurumi's first VR! She challenges the popular series! Sakura is a childhood friend, she's a student at a voice acting college and landed a gig for an erotic anime. She invites me over to her house to practice reading lines, but...the script for the erotic anime is filled with lewd language and sex scenes. She asked me to do something for her, which I didn't understand in terms of sexual experience. I lent out my dick to my childhood friend to practice actual sex...“I'll warn you, what I'm about to do is just acting...don't you dare never, ever, EVER get horny. I didn't mean everything I said! Don't get me wrong!” This film is powered up with anime cosplay! The embarrassing scripted dialogues are also extremely erotic and mushy! Enjoy ASMR with Sakura-chan's anime VOICE.
